CodeList.Name: Dermatology Life Quality Index Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Dermatology Life Quality Index test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how much has your skin affected any social or leisure activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Skin Affect Social or Leisure Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how much has your skin caused any sexual difficulties?
Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how embarrassed or self conscious have you been because of your skin?
Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how itchy, sore, painful or stinging has your skin been?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Itchy, Sore, Painful or Stinging Skin

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: DLQI1-How Much a Problem is Treatment
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: DLQI1-How Much a Problem is Treatment
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how much of a problem has the treatment for your skin been, for example by making your home messy, or by taking up time?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Treatment for Skin Make Home Messy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how much has your skin influenced the clothes you wear?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Skin Influence Clothes You Wear

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how much has your skin interfered with you going shopping or looking after your home or yard?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Skin Interfere With Shopping, Looking After Home or Yard

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: DLQI1-Made It Difficult to Do Any Sports
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: DLQI1-Made It Difficult to Do Any Sports
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how much has your skin made it difficult for you to do any sport?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Skin Made Difficult to Do Sport

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, has your skin prevented you from working or studying?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Skin Prevent Work or Study

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - If 'No', over the last week how much has your skin been a problem at work or studying?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Skin Has Been a Problem at Work or Study

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Dermatology Life Quality Index - Over the last week, how much has your skin created problems with your partner or any of your close friends or relatives?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: DLQI - Skin Create Problem With Partner, Friends or Relatives

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Dermatology Life Quality Index Questionnaire Test Name
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire DLQI Test Name Terminology
